snippet.title: Action Biker Starring Clumsy Colin
snippet.description:
Ahhh a game that evokes major NOSTALGIA. Myself and Kharneth one day in our early teens decided to turn round and go back home instead of going to school and head back to Kharneth's. We then proceeded to play this game for the rest of the day until finally being collared by our folks. After a ticking off we then continued to play this game for what probably ended up some between 24 - 48 hours. 
This game is truly addictive, guide Clumsy Colin around the town trying to find all his bike gear with various obstacles along the way. Believe me the reason Colin is clumsy is because of the controller. 
A simple game that is bags of fun.
MODERN GAME DEVELOPERS TAKE NOTE
